alert.note: Alert for Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wakulla and southeastern Liberty Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles north of Carrabelle, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek and Sanborn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
